pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rematch is a simple library of matchers, which express rules that can pass or fail. Matchers also report their failure with human readable output. Custom matchers can be build, and matchers can be combined using several predefined combinators or you can write your own. Matchers are often used in automated tests to provide expressive failure messages. Rematch is very similar to, and very inspired by the hamcrest library for Java
